details:
The Ultimate Quick Fix! Instantly firm and smooth the appearance of age-revealing trouble spots with this temporary tightener. Simply apply, let dry, and splash away or pat away excess residue to help erase the appearance of forehead creases, "11" lines, crow's-feet, enlarged pores, and nasal-labial folds all day.

Temporarily tighten the appearance of your skin & rewind the clock - instantly! Revolutionary formula means that the white residue is splashed away or patted away, while active firming agents remain behind. These agents work beneath the skin's surface to help tighten, firm & smooth the appearance of fine lines, deep wrinkles & pores.

Key Ingredients & Benefits:
Vitamins C & E - Anti-oxidants help to fight free radical attack
Pro Vitamin B5 - Acts as a penetrating moisturizer and helps aid in tissue repair
Retinyl Palmitate - A form of Vitamin A that helps increase skin elasticity for younger-looking skin
Active Firming Agents - Work to help tighten, firm & smooth the appearance of fine lines, deep wrinkles & pores

details:
PREVAGE Anti-aging Daily Serum protects and corrects the look of skin, helping shield it from environmental assaults and intercepting future aging signs to dramatically improve the look of sun-damaged skin. It's formulated with advanced Idebenone technology, the most powerful antioxidant available today*, which achieved an EPF rating of 95. (*For face products, environmental protection is against oxidative stress due to sun, smoke and pollution, with Idebenone compared to alpha lipoic acid, kinetin, vitamin C, vitamin E and coenzyme Q10.)
Advanced Idebenone technology creates a reserve within the skin to release protective and corrective benefits when and where skin needs it most.

PREVAGE Anti-aging Daily Serum addresses major skin care concerns with proven results:
94% of women saw a dramatic improvement in skin's overall appearance after just 4 weeks.**
74% of women saw a reduction in appearance of fine lines and wrinkles after eight weeks.**

In addition, PREVAGE Anti-aging Daily Serum achieved the following results in our latest clinical test***:
80% improvement in radiance and brightness.
70% improvement in skin tone.
69% improvement in the look of photo-damaged skin.
69% improvement in skin's overall appearance.
With continued use, skin's natural look of resilience is fortified, allowing skin to help fight the effects of environmental aggression. For best results, use it morning and night as the first step of your PREVAGE regimen.

*When compared to alpha lipoic acid, kinetin, vitamin C, vitamin E and coenzyme Q10.  EPF and Environmental Protection Factor are certification marks and trademarks owned by Pharma Cosmetix Research, L.L.C.
**For face products, environmental protection is against oxidative stress due to sun, smoke and pollution, with Idebenone compared to alpha lipoic acid, kinetin, vitamin C, vitamin E and coenzyme Q10. EPF and Environmental Protection Factor are certification marks and trademarks owned by Pharma Cosmetix Research, L.L.C.
**Consumer test conducted on 102 women age 25-65 over 4 weeks.
***12 week clinical test conducted on over 32 women aged 26-64.

product: Perfectionist Pro Rapid Brightening Treatment with Ferment2 + Vitamin C
details:
Dark spots. Sun spots. Age spots. Acne marks. The future looks bright: this ultra-lightweight, ultra-hydrating serum reveals a more even-toned, radiant look. With its exclusive complex of brightening actives, including potent 98.8% naturally derived Ferments plus Vitamin C, Estée Lauder's Perfectionist Pro Rapid Brightening Treatment helps BREAK the cycle of dullness, helps BLOCK the appearance of future dark spots with powerful anti-oxidants and helps BOOST an undeniable clarity and inner light.

For all ethnicities and skintones. Inspired by professional treatments, it rapidly brightens the look of skin, and targets the appearance of multiple types of spots and uneven skintone. Anti-oxidants help protect against environmental damage and the formation of new skin discolorations.The fast-absorbing formula of the Rapid Brightening Treatment helps smooth skin's texture and enhance the natural radiance of your glowing skin. With anti-irritants and a super-dose of Hyaluronic Acid, this Ferment² + Vitamin C serum infuses skin with plumping, soothing, long-lasting moisture-delivers 48H hydration. Oil-free. Gentle on all skintypes.

Key Ingredients:
FERMENT²: A powerful double-ferment combining a high concentration of our exclusive Yeast Ferment with a spot-targeting Molasses Ferment. Both ferments work to help reduce the appearance of dark spots and improve clarity for glowing skin. Estée Lauder scientists are experts in fermentation, a process that concentrates and amplifies an ingredient.
VITAMIN C: A renowned brightening, anti-aging and all-around skin-boosting active. In this Ferment² + Vitamin C serum, it targets dark spots in the deepest layer of skin's surface to help reduce the look of skin discolorations. And with its anti-oxidant properties, it helps prevent the appearance of new spots and skin discolorations.


Clinical results:
1 WEEK: 87% of women said their skin looked brighter with renewed clarity.*
1 BOTTLE**: See a significant reduction in the look of:
Dark spots
Sun spots
Age spots
Acne marks
85% said their skin looked more even-toned.*


*Consumer test on 280 women.**1.7 oz bottle.

product: Fresh Pressed Clinical Daily + Overnight Boosters with Pure Vitamins C 10% + A (Retinol)
details:
Clinique's freshest, most potent day-and-night de-aging booster system. Together, they deliver results equal to a leading prescription for lines and wrinkles.*

Turns your moisturizer into a de-aging powerhouse. Clinique's breakthrough Fresh Pressed Clinical Daily + Overnight Boosters with Pure Vitamins C 10% + A (Retinol) are freshly activated to deliver prescription-level results against visible wrinkles.* Simply mix a few pumps with your favorite Clinique moisturizer-Vitamin C in the morning, Vitamin A at night. Enjoy a potent de-aging boost without changing the moisturizer you love.

Every day, Vitamin C 10% works on skin's surface to instantly brighten. See remarkably even-toned and retexturized skin with continued use.

Every night, Vitamin A (Retinol) penetrates deeply into skin's surface. Over time, skin appears revitalized, lines and wrinkles 're-filled,' youthful tone recaptured.

Key Ingredients / Technology:

Clinique's guiding dermatologist recommends using topical Vitamins C & A together for their synergistic power. Fresh is key-they naturally degrade when exposed to oxygen and lose their effectiveness. Clinique's exclusive stay-fresh packaging protects their full potency until activation for maximum results.
Pure Vitamin C 10% powder concentrate is sealed in an airproof chamber
Pure Vitamin A (Retinol) liquid concentrate is encapsulated in a double-walled chamber

Activating the package releases the Pure Vitamin into the vial's de-aging soothing emulsion, which is bursting with powerful revitalizing ingredients. Once activated, each Booster is at maximum potency for 7 days/nights, but can be used up to 14 days/nights.

Vitamin A (Retinol) is so powerful that it actively transforms skin. You may experience a little dryness, redness or peeling during the first few weeks of use-all common indications that Vitamin A is working. To smooth your skin's transition to a nightly Vitamin A (Retinol) routine, Clinique recommends using a daily moisturizer and an extra gentle, sulfate-free cleanser. And be sure to wear sunscreen every day since your skin may be more photosensitive.

Allergy tested. 100% Fragrance free. No parabens. No phthalates. Just happy skin. Non-acnegenic. For all skin types.

*Proven Results: Based on a 12-week clinical study using Vitamin C 10% in AM and Vitamin A (Retinol) in PM, vs. nighttime use of a leading prescription ingredient:
First AM use: Radiance instantly boosted
In 1 week: Smoothness and texture improved
In 4 weeks: Fine facial wrinkles visibly reduced
In 12 weeks: Skin tone is more even & deep-set wrinkles and forehead lines dramatically reduced

Includes:
Fresh Pressed Daily Booster with Pure Vitamin C 10% (0.28 oz each)
Fresh Pressed Overnight Booster with Pure Vitamin A (Retinol) (0.23 oz each)

details:
We've all been there: already in bed and too tired to get up or heading straight from the gym to a night out. Because skincare doesn't have to be all or nothing, here's a beauty hack you can use in place of almost every step in your daily routine. Peach & Lily's Lazy Day's All-in-One Moisture Pads deliver the effects of a toner, essence and moisturizer in just one swipe. Packed with vitamins and antioxidants thanks to Ceramides, Hyaluronic Acid, Spinach, Broccoli, Carrot, Pomegranate, and Bamboo Extracts, these hydrating pads act like a green juice for your face, imparting rich, refreshing nourishment. Perfect for lazy or super busy- days (and everything in between), you'll look dewy, nourished and highlighted from within. Turns out, some things are not too good to be true.

RECOMMENDED FOR:
Dark spots, uneven tone
Dullness, dehydration (Alicia's Tip: dehydrated skin lacks moisture. Oily skin types can have dehydrated skin, too)
Skin lacking nourishment

WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU: Combined in a soaked moisture pad that delivers a bevy of skincare benefits deep into pores, this unique formula refreshes and hydrates, leaving skin looking radiant. Starring Ceramides to help strengthen the skin barrier, Hyaluronic Acid to bind moisture to the skin, Bamboo Extract to soothe and hydrate, along with superfood ingredients- Spinach, Broccoli, Carrot, and Pomegranate Extracts- which blast the skin with a bevy of vitamins, minerals and antioxidants, you'll feel nourished in no time. No shimmer, glitter or makeup here, just a dewy glow that brings to mind just-stepped-out-of-the-shower-freshness. With all this skin goodness, who needs a foundation?

THE MIND BEHIND: When it comes to skincare, consistency brings radiance. So many clients of Peach & Lily founder and esthetician, Alicia Yoon, would remark that one of the biggest challenges is to stick to a good routine. In real life, late nights or rushed early mornings happen, and sometimes the bathroom sink is simply too far away. A common refrain is "I'll start tomorrow." Well, tomorrow can be today. Thanks to these fast-acting pads, you'll be armed to stay hydrated and nourished, everyday, consistently. Keep this travel-friendly jar by your side for those days you just can't be bothered, and your skin will thank you for years to come.

WHAT'S NOT IN IT: Only good, clean fun here. There are NO Animal Fats/Oils/Musks, Benzalkonium Chloride, Benzophenone, Bisphenol A (BPA), Butoxyethanol, BHA, BHT, Chemical Sunscreens, Coal Tar Dyes, Cones, Detergent, Disodium EDTA, Polysorbates, MEA/DEA/TEA, Formaldehyde, Hydroquinone, Methyl Cellosolve, Methylisothiazolinone, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Mercury, Mercury Compounds, Mineral Oil, Oxybenzone, Parabens, Paraffin Oil, Petrolatum, Phthalates, PEGs, Polysorbates, Resorcinol, Siloxanes, Sulfates, Synthetic Fragrance, Thimerosal, Toluene, Triclosan, and Triclocarban. And never ever any animal-testing.

details: Elizabeth Arden's Retinol Ceramide Capsules are a luxurious, lightweight, semi-translucent serum that combines two of the biggest names in skincare in one, easy-to-use capsule: Retinol, the clinically proven wrinkle-smoother, and moisture-boosting ceramides. In one month, see more youthful skin, minimized wrinkles and better texture and tone. What makes our retinol different? As powerful as Retinol is, it is extremely sensitive to light and air which can affect its potency. Our secret is in the capsule and manufacturing process - light and air are kept out and potency in. In fact, the retinol in our capsules is 76% more potent than unencapsulated retinol.* This means that highly reactive retinol is protected, ensuring the potency of every application. *Based on testing of unencapsulated retinol equivalent predictive of 10 months of shelf life.

details:

Elizabeth Arden's ADVANCED Ceramide Capsules Daily Youth Restoring Serum is a lightweight, silky-smooth serum that delivers an enhanced complex of skin-identical ceramides and supports natural lipid levels. Retexturize and revitalize the look of skin for a visibly smoother, firmer and youthful appearance.

95% Showed clinical improvement in skin firmness

product: +Retinol Vita C Power Serum Firming + Brightening Treatment
details:
Uniquely formulated with the gold standards in anti-aging, Retinol and Vitamin C, Kate Somerville's +Retinol Vita C Power Serum Firming + Brightening is a silky, weightless face serum that acts like an incredibly rejuvenating ''power nap'' to refresh dull, tired skin while you sleep. Wake up to a visibly firmer, brighter and more luminously youthful-looking complexion.

Benefits:
Retinol visibly improves skin firmness and texture while smoothing the look of lines and wrinkles
L-ascorbic acid, the purest form of Vitamin C, helps dramatically brighten and even skin tone
Added plant extracts and antioxidants help neutralize free radicals that can cause premature aging
Clinically Proven Results*

After just 1 use:
97% showed highly significant improvement in the look of fine lines and wrinkles

After just 1 week:
94% showed highly significant improvement in the look of fine lines and wrinkles
93% saw improvement in the look of skin elasticity
90% said their skin tone looked brighter
90% said their skin looked smoother
90% said their skin looked more luminous
*Results based on independent Clinical Study

What else you need to know:

Soothing plant extracts, antioxidants, and two forms of hydrating hyaluronic acid were added to help offset dryness commonly triggered by retinol. If you're new to this powerhouse anti-aging ingredient, start by using +Retinol Vita C Power Serum only three times a week. Once skin has adjusted, use it every other night, slowly working up to nightly use. Layer under moisturizer if dryness is a seasonal or primary skincare concern.

Proud to be cruelty-free. Kate Somerville has been certified cruelty-free by PETA, solidifying their commitment to never test their products or ingredients on animals.

details:
WHAT IT IS: An essence is one of the most fundamental skincare products in Asian beauty routines. In Korea, essences are nearly mandatory because they focus intensively on delivering ample hydration to skin via a cocktail of skin-transforming ingredients. Essences not only help fight breakouts, improve skin's radiance and impart long-lasting hydration, but they are also formulated to sink deep and fast into skin. Using next-gen technology, Peach & Lily's Wild Dew Treatment Essence includes fresh, clean, fast-acting extracts that will leave you looking and feeling fresh as a daisy.

RECOMMENDED FOR:
Dehydrated, dull skin (Alicia's Tip: dehydrated skin lacks moisture. Oily skin types can have dehydrated skin, too)
Rough texture
Dark spots, uneven skin tone
Fine lines, wrinkles
Redness, inflammation

WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU: A look at the superstar ingredients in Peach & Lily's Wild Dew Treatment Essence:
Lotus Extract: combats free radical damage from sun, pollution, stress
Niacinamide: helps quell inflammation and brighten dark spots
Yeast Ferment: delivers antioxidants and a bevy of nutrients to powerfully aid in skin's cellular renewal
Radish Seed Extract: helps to nourish skin and combat premature aging
Adenosine: clinically proven to help firm and energize and smooth skin's surface
Hyaluronic Acid Complex: a proprietary blend of short-chain, medium-chain and long-chain hyaluronic acid molecules that helps moisturize every layer of skin, leaving it hydrated, plumped and radiant
Bamboo Extract- a beloved ingredient in Korean skincare, bamboo is rich in antioxidants that protect skin from oxidative stress and strengthen skin's barrier

THE MIND BEHIND: Peach & Lily's founder, Alicia Yoon, is a celebrated esthetician and a leading skincare expert. She worked with top labs in Korea to create the Wild Dew Treatment Essence as a nod to the Korean beauty staple. Both soothing and skin-perfecting, Alicia's power-packed version, which can be used in the morning and afternoon to imbue your complexion with goodness, is chock full of brightening, firming and hydrating agents that will leave you feeling footloose and photo-ready, no filter required. The perfect skincare addition for those seeking just "a bit more" for their daily routine.

THE PEACH & LILY PROMISE: Caring for your skin can be overwhelming. You might be tired of the skincare guessing game as you try to figure out what will work for you. You want products that deliver dramatic results, but you're worried they will be too harsh or make you break out. You want delightful textures, but want to avoid chemicals and harmful ingredients. Peach & Lily is all too familiar with trial and error, trade-offs, and compromises when it comes to skincare.

The innovative beauty brand created the Peach & Lily skincare collection to deliver everything you want without worries or guesswork. Pushing the limits of innovation by combining breakthrough research and proven skincare traditions, you will enjoy dramatic results, delivered in a radically safe and delightful way. Peach & Lily formulas feature powerful, clinically-proven ingredients, thoughtfully crafted to be gentle and safe. In short, you get big results with a beautiful experience, and zero compromises. Who says you can't have it all?

WHAT'S NOT IN IT: Only good, clean fun here. There are NO Animal Fats/Oils/Musks, Benzalkonium Chloride, Benzophenone, Bisphenol A (BPA), Butoxyethanol, BHA, BHT, Chemical Sunscreens, Coal Tar Dyes, Cones, Detergent, Disodium EDTA, Polysorbates, MEA/DEA/TEA, Formaldehyde, Hydroquinone, Methyl Cellosolve, Methylisothiazolinone, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Mercury, Mercury Compounds, Mineral Oil, Oxybenzone, Parabens, Paraffin Oil, Petrolatum, Phthalates, PEGs, Polysorbates, Resorcinol, Siloxanes, Sulfates, Synthetic Fragrance, Thimerosal, Toluene, Triclosan, and Triclocarban. And never ever any animal-testing.

details:
The Ordinary's Mandelic Acid 10% + HA offers superficial dermal peeling that is gentler than other alpha hydroxy acids. The molecular weight of mandelic acid is 152.1 daltons which is larger than other alpha hydroxy acids (glycolic acid is 76.0 daltons, for example). This larger size allows mandelic acid to penetrate the skin more slowly which in turn makes it very gentle and suitable for all skin types including the most sensitive skin. You don't need a concentration of more than 10%, because then you would simply be achieving an indirect peeling strength that is more easily offered through lower percentages of glycolic acid.

Benefits:
Targets uneven tone, textural irregularities and fine lines
Suitable for sensitive skin types
Cruelty-free & vegan
Formulated without alcohol, oil, silicone, nuts or gluten

product: Revitalift Derm Intensives Night Serum with 0.3% Pure Retinol
details:
Visibly reduce wrinkles, even deep wrinkles. L'Oréal Revitalift Derm Intensives Night Serum with 0.3% Pure Retinol is L'Oreal's most potent and has their highest concentration of pure retinol. Why choose pure retinol?  Pure retinol is considered to be the most potent form of all retinols. It is known to be more effective than retinol derivatives, but it degrades over time.  This patent-pending night serum was specially formulated to remain very stable. What does this mean? It is potent and effective from the first drop to the last - giving you powerful anti-aging results with continued use. 

Starting a Pure Retinol Routine: This product contains high potency retinol which may cause initial redness, tingling or dryness which is normal even if you've been using Retinol before. Your skin may need time to get used to this powerful serum, so it¿s important to introduce it gradually. Use a couple of times a week at first and slowly move to nightly use. Read product carton before use.

SPF Lotion Reminder: when using retinol products, always use an SPF Lotion the morning after, such as Revitalift Triple Power SPF 30 Lotion.

Key Ingredients:
Pure Retinol - a top dermatologist recommended anti-aging ingredient proven to fight key signs of aging such as wrinkles, even deep ones (with many retinols available in skincare, those that don't say pure are likely a derivative and less potent)
Benefits:
Night Serum with 0.3 percent pure retinol visibly reduces wrinkles, even deep ones
Visible results: reduces wrinkles, even deep wrinkles 
An external panel of dermatologists validated this serum for safety, efficacy and results
This serum is allergy tested, absorbs quickly, and does not clog pores (non-comedogenic)
Fragrance-free, silicone-free, paraben-free
Results:
After day 1, skin feels moisturized and texture feels more refined
Overtime, wrinkles and deep wrinkles are visibly reduced, skin is smoother, and complexion is brighter.
*An external panel of dermatologists validated that Revitalift Derm Intensives serums uphold strict formulation standards and reviewed independent clinical testing results and protocols.

The Curél Moisture Facial Lotion Enrich is a light, soothing liquid essence that enhances the effect of the subsequent moisturizer. It instantly hydrates to calm dry, sensitive skin, relieves tightness and locks in moisture.

Millions of Japanese women use a double moisturizing process which starts with a pre-moisturizing liquid such as this Moisture Facial Lotion Enrich. The second step is to apply a moisturizer. This process helps to repair the skin's natural protective barrier by locking in essential hydration. For best results, use this Moisture Facial Lotion Enrich followed by the Curél Moisture Facial Milk or the Curél Intensive Moisture Facial Cream.

product: Rénergie Lift Multi-Action Lifting and Firming Starter Kit
details:
Discover Rénergie Lift Multi-Action Lifting and Firming Starter Kit, Lancome's best-selling formula that minimizes signs of aging and reveals the ultimate lifting effect for younger-looking skin.

This 4-piece kit offers a simple, targeted routine that visibly lifts, firms and tightens skin with a healthy-looking radiance.

Rénergie Lift Multi-Action Lifting and Firming Starter Kit includes:
Rénergie Lift Multi-Action Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 15 Lifting and Firming Cream (0.50 oz)
Rénergie Lift Multi-Action Night Lifting and Firming Night Cream (0.50 oz)
Rénergie Lift Multi-Action Eye Lifting and Firming Eye Cream (0.20 oz)
Advanced Génifique Youth Activating Concentrate (0.27 oz)

Start with Advanced Génifique and visibly improve 10 key signs of aging including: skin texture, resiliency, elasticity, firmness, sagginess, fine lines and wrinkles, radiance, clarity and tone. Drop by drop, this potent serum restores smoother, more supple and more luminous skin that you can see and feel in just 7 days.

Then, smooth eye contours with Rénergie Lift Multi-Action Eye Cream - lift and firm skin around the eyes as bags are deflated, wrinkles are smoothed and dark circles are faded.

In the morning, use Rénergie Lift Multi-Action SPF 15 Day Cream to provide all-day hydration and visibly lift, firm and tighten all facial zones. Signs of aging - including sagging, wrinkles and fine lines - are minimized while added SPF 15 provides additional protection against future sun damage.

Complete your routine as you sleep, when skin's ability to repair itself peaks, with Rénergie Lift Multi-Action Night Cream for skin texture that looks firmer, denser and replenished. All facial zones are visibly tightened and, after 4 weeks, wrinkles are reduced and skin is smoothed.

Experience visible results in just 7 days, skin is visibly lifted, firmed and tightened.

Lancôme Advanced Génifique Sensitive Antioxidant Serum is a dual anti-oxidant serum, with a self-activating mixer, that blends ferulic acid, vitamin e and centella asiatica to help protect and calm stressed skin.

From travel, to changes in season, to the day-to-day dwellings of life, stressed out skin is real. This freshly activated serum instantly soothes skin's surface sensitivities, such as tightness, itchiness and redness, while providing anti-oxidant protection against environmental-triggered discomforts.

details:
Protein Booster Skin Serum is a multifunctional anti-aging serum that offers a daily-dose of anti-aging defense.

The silky liquid texture is readily absorbed allowing for immediate delivery of the efficacious ingredients. Serums are intended to be used with a moisturizer or blended with another product. It is the ideal companion to any of Jack Black's moisturizers or Post Shave Cooling Gel. Except for customers with oily skin, serums are not intended to provide adequate hydration when used alone.

Peptides are chains of amino acids (the building blocks of protein) that are essential to human life. They function as messengers in the skin, allowing the epidermis and dermis to communicate more efficiently. As we age, communication diminishes within the skin resulting in fine lines, wrinkles and loss of elasticity. Peptides improve cell communication by sending specific signals that affect skin's response.

product: Vital Skin-Strengthening Hyaluronic Acid Super Serum
details:
Kiehl's Vital Skin-Strengthening Hyaluronic Acid Super Serum strengthens skin while helping defend against skin-aging stressors for youthful, radiant skin. These stressors include UV exposure, pollution and extreme temperatures along with tobacco, stress, lack of sleep and nutrition which can cause dullness, dehydration, fine lines and other signs of aging.

Active ingredients:

11kDa Hyaluronic Acid:
Hyaluronic Acid is known to help smooth and plump fine lines and is commonly used in skincare products to maintain moisture levels to boost hydration and visibly refine skin's texture. Their smallest molecular size of Hyaluronic Acid, 11kDa, penetrates to fortify skin within its deepest surface layers.* By delivering hydration to skin's most vulnerable layer, 11kDa Hyaluronic Acid helps better retain moisture for improved resiliency, suppleness and bounce.

Adaptogenic Herbal Complex:
Kiehl's Adaptogenic Herbal Complex is a proprietary blend of adaptogens - Red Ginseng Root, Holy Basil and Schisandra Berry - traditionally used in Traditional Chinese, Korean and Ayurvedic Medicine. Within our formula, these adaptogens work synergistically to defend skin from stressors while renewing and resurfacing skin's texture for a smooth, radiant appearance.

Clinical Results:
This serum is clinically demonstrated* to double skin¿s strength** and helps visibly reduce fine lines, smooth texture and boost radiance for a healthy-looking glow. Clinically demonstrated to boost radiance by 29% and improve resilience by 38% for glowing, healthy-looking skin* Clinically demonstrated to visibly reduces fine lines by 27%* Clinically demonstrated* to double skin¿s strength**
*Based on a 4-week clinical study on 58 subjects tested in urban and polluted environments.
**Based on Skin Strength Index = Composite average score of skin suppleness, plumpness and resiliency.

details:
Phyto-Nature Firming Serum is Dermalogica's most advanced anti-aging serum yet! This dual-phase serum protects skin from external lifestyle factors, such as stress, UVA/UVB rays, poor sleep, pollution and reactivates how younger skin cells act. In the lifting phase, camu camu super fruit and Madagascar green coffee beans, both rich in antioxidants, reduce inflammation and protect against free radicals. details:
Resveratrol 3% + Ferulic Acid 3% from The Ordinary contains two antioxidants: resveratrol and ferulic acid. Resveratrol is a natural phenol found in several plants while ferulic acid is a phytochemical found naturally in the walls of plant cells. Resveratrol and ferulic acid target textural irregularities. They also provide antioxidant support, protecting the skin against environmental stressors.

Benefits:
Protect skin from the damaging effects of external aggressors that contribute to signs of aging
Cruelty-free & Vegan
Does not contain alcohol, gluten, nuts, oil, silicone, parabens, sulfates

details:
Find your Clinique iD. Get scanned to find the custom-blend hydrator that's right for you with Clinical Reality.

The Clinique iD Cartridge exclusively pairs with the Clinique iD Hydration Base to create a first-of-its-kind custom-blend hydrator with 20 possible Base + Cartridge combinations.

Step 1: Choose a Hydration Base. See your 3 options below.
Step 2: Complete your custom blend with this Active Cartridge. It's exclusively designed to be combined with a Hydration Base.

Active Cartridge Concentrate for Imperfections:
Delivers concentrated ingredients, including Salicylic Acid, to help visibly minimize imperfections, such as uneven texture and redness, and help control oil.
With continued use, visibly clear imperfections and fend off future ones.

Active Cartridge Concentrate for Fatigue:
Delivers concentrated actives, including Taurine, to energize and revive glow.
With continued use, see a visible reduction in signs of fatigue.

Active Cartridge Concentrate for Lines & Wrinkles:
Delivers concentrated actives, including Whey Protein, to smooth lines and re-plump.
With continued use, see a visible reduction in lines and wrinkles.

Active Cartridge Concentrate for Pores & Uneven Texture:
Delivers concentrated actives, including AHAs, to reduce the look of pores and retexturize skin.
With continued use, see visible improvement in skin texture.

Active Cartridge Concentrate for Uneven Skin Tone:
Delivers concentrated actives, including Japanese Angelica Root, to even tone and brighten.
With continued use, see a visible improvement in unified skin tone.

Active Cartridge Concentrate for Irritation:
Delivers concentrated actives, including Lactobacillus Probiotic Ferment, to calm and comfort skin.
With continued use, see a visible reduction in skin redness.

Combine this cartridge with a Clinique iD Dramatically Different Base (sold separately). Choose from 4:
Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+: For dry skin. Hydrates all day. Helps strengthen skin's moisture barrier, so more moisture stays in. Slips on easily, absorbs quickly. Protects against skin-damaging pollution
Dramatically Different Hydrating Jelly: For normal skin. Delivers 24-hour hydration repair plus pollution protection. Clean shield technology locks in the good-like moisture-and filters out the bad. Strengthens skin's moisture barrier and improves resiliency. Unique water-jelly texture feels fresh, penetrates quickly
Dramatically Different Oil-Free Gel: For oily skin. Combines all-day oil-free hydration with skin-strengthening ingredients. Balances and refreshes oilier skin types. Slips on easily, absorbs quickly. Protects against skin-damaging pollution.
Dramatically Different Moisturizing BB-Gel: 8-hour oil-free hydration, plus Transforming Tint Release Technology delivers a sheer wash of color to naturally perfect and unify skin tone.

*Notice some extra space in your hydration base? That allows for the addition of the Active Cartridge. The Hydration Base is a different design than the standard bottles of Dramatically Different Moisturizers. The mouth has a wider opening and there's extra room inside for the addition of the Cartridge. The standard bottles of Clinique's moisturizers will not work with the Cartridges.

Benefits:
Allergy tested
100% Fragrance-free
Paraben free
Phthalate free
Dermatologist-Developed
Non-Acnegenic.

product: Even Better Clinical Radical Dark Spot Corrector + Interrupter
details:
Even Better Clinical Radical Dark Spot Corrector + Interrupter is Clinique's most powerful brightening serum helps visibly correct discoloration and acne scars, while interrupting future dark spots. See a -39% reduction in dark spots and acne scars in 12 weeks.

Skin Types:
All Skin Types

What It Does:
Clinique's "damage eraser" with patented CL302 Equalizer Technology is now more concentrated, with boosted technology to deliver dramatic brightening results - yet is still gentle enough for all skin types.
Now with double the dose, this formula features our proprietary brightening molecule for a more even skin tone plus improves the look of dark spots, age spots, and acne scars.
Interrupts future dark spots, too.

Key Ingredients/Technology:
CL302 Equalizer Technology targets dark spots in two ways: corrects with the CL302 Complex and interrupts future ones with the Interrupter Complex.

CL302 Complex: with 2X the brightening dose helps visibly reduce dark spots and discoloration. It includes the following:
UP302 (dimethoxytolyl propylresorcinol): A targeted brightening molecule inspired by border silver, or dianella ensifolia, a botanical known in traditional Chinese medicine for its antioxidant properties.
Ascorbyl glucoside: Helps reduce the appearance of discoloration.
Glucosamine: Weakens the bonds that hold dead skin cells together to encourage the departure of cells containing melanin.
Yeast extract: Clinique's "cluster buster" breaks up (exfoliates) large clusters of pigment into smaller particles so they're less visible.
Salicylic acid: Gently sloughs off the uppermost layers of the skin to reveal fresher, more even tone skin.

Interrupter Complex: with a cocktail of soothing ingredients helps minimize irritation to interrupt future hyperpigmentation. It includes the following:
Gyokuro (camellia sinensis leaf) extract: A green tea harvested with a special method in Japan that helps quell irritation.
Mulberry root extract: Rich in antioxidants that help counter free-radical damage that causes irritation.
Rice bran extract: A potent anti-oxidant and anti-irritant, and helps to prevent future dark spots by defending skin against damaging free radicals.
Complex of olive squalene, barley extract, and wheat germ extract: Helps nourish and replenish skin with hydration.
Dipotassium glycyrrizate (licorice extract): Acts as an anti-irritant that reduces the negative visible effects of stress and pollution.

Clinique Clean Philosophy:
No parabens
No phthalates
No fragrance
Just happy skin

What else is this product free of?
Oil
Denatured alcohol
SLS
SLES
Sulfates

Meet the power couple for a more even skin tone: Clinique's Even Better Clinical Radical Dark Spot Corrector + Interrupter & Even Better Makeup Broad Spectrum SPF 15.

details:
Go makeup and filter-free with this "super juice" serum, which delivers everything you need for picture-perfect skin. Expertly blended with potent earth-born and high-tech beautifying ingredients, you'll uncover skin that is poreless, translucent, and luminous like a pane of glass. Silky, weightless, and instantly-absorbing, Peach & Lily's Glass Skin Refining Serum helps hydrate, calm, brighten and firm, delivering more dramatic results with continued use

RECOMMENDED FOR:
Dullness and uneven skin tone
Rough skin texture
Wrinkles, fine lines, sagging
Dehydrated skin (Alicia's Tip: dehydrated skin lacks moisture. Oily skin types can have dehydrated skin, too)
Redness, inflammation

WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU: The Serum's superstar ingredients, delivered deep into skin via a revolutionary delivery system:
Peach Extract: full of vitamins, minerals, and essential fatty acids to help keep skin resilient
Niacinamide: helps quell inflammation, brighten and provide antioxidative benefits
Asian Mountain Yam Extract: dramatically helps to reduce flakiness
Madecassoide: derived from Centella Asiatica Extract, it helps curb inflammation and stimulate collagen production
Hyaluronic Acid Complex: proprietary blend of short-chain, medium-chain and long-chain hyaluronic acid molecules that moisturizes every layer of skin, leaving it hydrated, plumped and radiant
Peptide Complex: proprietary blend of peptides that signals collagen production, helping fill fine lines and deeply-etched wrinkles, while firming skin for a smoother, glassier appearance

THE MIND BEHIND: Peach & Lily's founder, Alicia Yoon, is a celebrated esthetician and a leading skincare expert. Inspired by Asia's "glass skin" beauty paradigm, she set out to create a product that wasn't about surface-level results, but instead transformed skin from within. With the goal of delivering a poreless, refined and radiant complexion (that that can't be faked with laser treatments or a quick fix), Alicia worked with cutting edge labs in Korea to develop a truly game-changing serum. Meant to reveal skin that is happy and healthy from the inside out, The Glass Skin Refining Serum will give your visage a new lease on life. Discover the magic of having skin that's so well cared for that it looks like pristine glass.

THE PEACH & LILY PROMISE: Caring for your skin can be overwhelming. Tired of the skincare guessing game as you try to figure out what will work for you? You want products that deliver dramatic results, but you're worried they will be too harsh or make you break out. You want delightful textures but want to avoid chemicals and harmful ingredients. Peach & Lily is all too familiar with trial and error, trade-offs, and compromises when it comes to skincare.

The innovative beauty brand created the Peach & Lily skincare collection to deliver everything you want without worry or guesswork. Pushing the limits of innovation by combining breakthrough research and proven skincare traditions, you'll enjoy dramatic results, delivered in a radically safe and delightful way. Peach & Lily formulas feature powerful, clinically-proven ingredients, thoughtfully crafted to be gentle and safe. In short, you get big results with a beautiful experience, and no compromises. You can have it all!

WHAT'S NOT IN IT: Only good, clean fun here. NO Animal Fats/Oils/Musks, Benzalkonium Chloride, Benzophenone, Bisphenol A (BPA), Butoxyethanol, BHA, BHT, Chemical Sunscreens, Coal Tar Dyes, Cones, Detergent, Disodium EDTA, Polysorbates, MEA/DEA/TEA, Formaldehyde, Hydroquinone, Methyl Cellosolve, Methylisothiazolinone, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Mercury, Mercury Compounds, Mineral Oil, Oxybenzone, Parabens, Paraffin Oil, Petrolatum, Phthalates, PEGs, Polysorbates, Resorcinol, Siloxanes, Sulfates, Synthetic Fragrance, Thimerosal, Toluene, Triclosan, and Triclocarban. And never ever any animal-testing.

product: Mini Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex
details:
Experience the next generation of Estée Lauder's revolutionary formula-the most comprehensive Advanced Night Repair serum ever. Patented until 2033. Now with Chronolux Power Signal Technology, this deep-and fast-penetrating serum reduces the look of multiple signs of aging caused by the environmental assaults of modern life. Skin looks smoother and less lined, younger, more radiant and even toned.

Estée Lauder's #1 serum to powerfully fight the look of multiple signs of aging. Proven effective for all skintones. This is the high performance face serum beautiful skin can't live without. Advanced Night Repair harnesses the restorative power of night to deliver visible renewal. It works night and day to help skin maximize its overall natural rhythm of repair and protection.

Every Night

While you sleep, it helps ignite skin's natural nightly repair process. Fast. A high level of Hyaluronic Acid helps lock in moisture for 72 hours. This helps create the perfect environment to optimize skin's natural repair process.
The exclusive Chronolux Power Signal Technology helps increase skin's natural ability for visible self-repair, with in vitro testing showing it promotes skin's natural renewal of vital new cells and boosts its natural production of collagen.

Every Day

During the day, it helps protect skin from environmental assaults-a key part of skin's own daily rhythm. Helps defend skin against the visible effects of free radical damage from environmental sources like pollution, ozone, blue light, infrared and micro dust. Provides 8-hour anti-oxidant protection to provide all-day defense against environmental assaults, and help keep skin looking younger, longer.

One Dropper:
Skin looks radiant and plumped with hydration-all the way through till morning.
NEW 8-hour anti-oxidant power.
NEW 72-hour hydration (includes Hyaluronic Acid).
NEW Strengthens skin barrier in just 4 hours.
SAME beloved oil-free texture.

Three Weeks:
Lines and wrinkles appear reduced.
88% of women said skin looked more youthful.(1)

One Bottle(2)
NEW Now, skin feels firmer. 89% of women agreed.(1)
Skin looks healthy, has a new bounce and vitality.
NEW Over time, pores look diminished.

(1) Consumer testing on 543 women. (2) 1.7 oz./50ml bottle.


Ideal For:
For all skintypes. Multiple signs of aging; Visible age prevention; Loss of firmness, tone; Lines and wrinkles; Dryness, dehydration-includes Hyaluronic Acid; Dullness, loss of radiance; Uneven skintone.

Key Formula Facts:
Oil-free
New glass bottle...and it's recyclable
Dermatologist-tested
Ophthalmologist-tested
Non-acnegenic; won't clog pores

Free of parabens, phthalates, sulfites, sulfates and mineral oil

details:
The science of sleep meets the beauty of sleep in this Beauty Sleep Resurfacing Serum from Honest Beauty. This gentle, exfoliating serum works overnight to dissolve away dead skin cells.

The Science: Five naturally derived alpha-hydroxy acids (count 'em) - glycolic, lactic, citric, malic and tartaric - suspended for a slower release while you sleep.

The Beauty: Because each AHA sinks in slowly instead of all at once, skin gets all the glowy and smoothing benefits of resurfacing, without the irritation of traditional exfoliation. Now that's how you sleep smarter to beauty harder.

Clinically tested to deliver gentle yet effective resurfacing:*

AHA's - a blend of glycolic, lactic, citric, malic and tartaric alpha hydroxy acids encased in layers for slow release on the skin over time for gentle resurfacing

Just like your body needs vitamins to be healthy, so does your skin. Vitamins can make a difference in the way your skin looks and feels and even in how well it ages. Vitamin C helps by brightening skin tone, reducing the appearance of fine lines, and protecting the skin from environmental stress with its antioxidant properties. In 1 week***, women saw a visible reduction in the appearance of lines & wrinkles on the forehead and around the eyes
By 2 weeks***, women saw visible improvements in the appearance of 6 targeted wrinkle areas (forehead, crow's feet, lips, between brows, under eyes and nasolabial folds)

76% said the serum gave them better results than they thought possible from skincare

Among women who had already had injectables, after trialing the product for 2 months***:
80% said the serum gave them better results than they thought possible from skincare
73% said they would delay their next treatment
